PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-03922010-03-25,  ,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY
ActCanada Business Corporations Act
Canada Cooperatives Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Department of Industry Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN DEPARTMENT OF INDUSTRY REGULATIONS, in order to clarify the rules for the granting of names to corporations and cooperatives. The regulations should be clearer and easier to read while resolving any concerns with the drafting language used. This also includes a new section in both sets of Regulations to resolve concerns about the name of a corporation or cooperative resulting from a short-form amalgamation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0072 Publication Date: 2010-04-14
AttachmentsAttachment
